titles.title: Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual”

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual” (fols. 3ra-133va) - Introduction (fols. 3ra-5vb) - Discourse of St. Athanasius on death (fols. 10ra-14va) - Mäṣḥaf zä-wäḍʾat ʾǝm-ʾIyärusalem “Book that Came from Jerusalem” (fols. 14va-20ra) - Antiphons (kǝśtät) (fols. 30ra-31va, 49rb-49va, 65ra-65va, 67vb-68rb, 74ra-rb, 76rb) - Homily by St. Jacob of Serug for the funeral of priests and deacons (fols. 50va-60ra) - Homily by ʾabba Sälama, Metropolitan of Ethiopia (fols. 60ra-62ra) - Lǝfafä ṣǝdq “Bandlet of Righteousness” (fols. 89va-90va) - Mängädä sämay “Journey to Heaven” (fols. 93ra-94vb)

donors.donor: Wäldä Maryam and Wäldä Giyorgis are mentioned in supplication formulas throughout the Ms.

txstates.txstate: Many fols. are heavily stained with wax and dirt. The spine cover is damaged, crudely repair with synthetic threads. The Ms. has probably been resewn. Cuts repaired on fols. 30, 59, 60, 67, 111, 133. Endband stitches close to the bottom of the Ms. has been repaired. Fols. 27, 45, 46, 94 are of a smaller size.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 6 tools are used: double circle, triple line fillet, corni-form, cross hatching, triple sine wave, interlaced line fillet).

bnothers.bnother: One pair of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover close to the head of the codex. Endbands are made of small pieces of folded leather.

txfolios.txfolio: Foliation mistake: the leaf after fol. 16 has not been foliated (the image has numbered 16a)

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – ፩I፩(8/fols. 3r-10v) – ፪II፪(8/fols. 11r-17v) – ፫III(8/fols. 18r-25v) – ፬IV፬(8/fols. 26r-33v) – ፭V፭(8/fols. 34r-41v) – ፮VI፮(8/fols. 42r-49v) – ፯VII፯(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 6; 7, stub after 1/fols. 50r-57v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 58r-65v) – ፱IX፱(8/fols. 66r-73v) – ፲X፲(8/fols. 74r-81v) – ፲፩XI(8/fols. 82r-89v) – ፲፪XII፲፪(8/fols. 90r-97v) – ፲፫XIII፲፫(8/fols. 98r-105v) – ፲፬XIV፲፬(8/fols. 106r-113v) – ፲፭XV፲፭(8/fols. 114r-121v) – ፲፮XVI፲፮(8/fols. 122r-129v) – ፲፯XVII(6/fols. 130r-135v).

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; a few lines on the incipit page of the text, alternating with black lines; two initial lines of each sections of the text; names of Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 (e.g., fols. 33ra, 35ra, 36vb); parts of abbreviations; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals; some other words, e.g., wä-yǝblu (e.g., fols. 15va, 16vb, 17va), wä-kaʿǝbä (fols. 19va, 22rb), ṣällǝyu (e.g., fols. 23ra, 39vb, 45vb), qǝdmä wangel (e.g., fols. 33rb, 35ra, 37ra), wä-ʾǝmzǝ (e.g., fols. 35ra, 36vb, 39ra), wä-tǝbl (e.g., fols.35vb, 45rb, 50ra), ʾǝgäle (fol. 115rb).

abbreviations.abbreviation: ይ፡ ካ፡ for ይበል፡ ካሕን፡ (e.g., fols. 20va, 21rb, 22ra) ይ፡ ዲ፡ for ይበል፡ ዲያቆን፡ (e.g., fols. 20va, 21ra, 22ra) ይ፡ ሕ፡ for ይበል፡ ሕዝብ፡ (fol. 21rb, 22ra) ፍ/ ፍ፤ ወን፤ ረ፤ ለ፤ በ፤ for ፍቱሐ፡ ወንጹሐ፡ ረስዮ፡ ለዝንቱ፡ በድን፡ (fols. 23rb, 34rb) ይ፡ እ፡ for ይምሐሮ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ (fol. 108ra-rb, 108va-vb) ስ፡ for ስቡሕኒ፡ ውእቱ፡ ወልዑልኒ፡ ውእቱ፡ ለዓለም፡ (fol. 123rb-va) ን፡ ወ፡ / ን፡ እ፡ ወ፡ for ንስእለከ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ወናስተበቍዓከ፡ (fols. 125rb, 125va-vb, 126ra-rb) ይ፡ ወ፡ ስ፡ ለ፡ for ይትአኰት፡ ወይሴባሕ፡ ስሙ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ (fol. 127rb) የ፡ ወ፡እ ወ፡ስ፡ እ፡ for እኩት፡ ወስቡሕ፡ ስምከ፡ እግዚኦ፡ (fols. 127va-vb, 128ra)

extras.extra: - Spaces (for rubricated names or punctuation signes?) left unfilled on fols. 26va, 27ra, 28vb, 31ra-va, 78va, 82rb, 82va-vb. - A space filled with three horizontal red line on fol. 62rb. - Words or passages erased: fols. 28vb, 35rb, 83vb, 133ra. - Correction written interlineally: fols 31rb. - The scribe used compressed script on fols. 30ra-31va, 49rb-49va, 65ra-65va, 67vb-68rb, 74ra-rb, 76rb. - An extensive text is effaced on fol. 47ra.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Decorated quire marks are repeated thrice in the upper margin of the first and the last fols. of the quire: fols. 3r, 10v, 11r, 17v, 18r, 26r, 33v, 34r, 41v, 42r, 49v, 50r, 57v, 58r, 66r, 73v, 74r, 81v, 82r, 90r, 97v, 98r, 105v, 106r, 113v, 114r, 121v, 122r, 129v, 130r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Notes crudely written in the upper margin referring to the content of the Ms.: fols. 23rb, 83ra, 86va, 89va, 108ra. - Coloured threads for navigation in the text has been inserted in the upper and outer margin of fols. 20, 21, 23, 37, 60, 80, 82, 86, 101, 106.
